I‚Äôm feeling frustrated because I‚Äôve had this app 2 years and until this year, I had virtually no issues. I hope you can fix this quickly because I really do love this app and it is good for me.

**UPDATE TO REVIEW**
15JAN26‚Äì this app has continued to get worse the longer that I use it. I haven‚Äôt received any affirmations in a week now; yes, I‚Äôve cleared all my notifications. And with their last update to the app itself, the alarm for my streak reminder has disappeared. In addition, when I manually open the app, the screen is white and takes nearly 20 full seconds to load. I definitely will not continue my paid subscription when it‚Äôs due for renewal. This app has had too many bugs, glitches, and in hasn‚Äôt worked consistently and properly in months.

[22JAN26] MonkeyTaps you say you read every single review..  another week has elapsed and I have not received one single affirmation. I‚Äôve been cleaning ALL my notifications on my iPhone as previously instructed. I‚Äôve updated the app, I‚Äôve rebooted, I‚Äôve manually opened the app, etc., and still nothing. I don‚Äôt know why your team hasn‚Äôt yet fixed this issue. I do like the app‚Äî when it works properly.

[06FEB26] - I guess no one reads this but I‚Äôm going to write anyway. My app gave me affirmations all day this past Tuesday after not working for a couple weeks. However, it gave me the ‚ÄúTap Here to Continue Receiving Affirmations‚Äù warning (which was random because it had been giving me my affirmations regularly up to that moment on Tuesday. Since that notification popped up, I‚Äôve had no more affirmations.', 'author': 'Chelevision', 'version': '6.22.0'}, {'date': '2026-02-05', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Canceled yet still charged', 'content': 'I tried the 3 day trial. I was surprised to see the app still active this morning (2/5) so I looked on my subscriptions. Sure enough, it says my subscription will expire‚Ä¶ 2/4/27. If I canceled it yesterday, why did it renew for a year and charge me!?
